snippet: When a man snatched a purse from a young woman in Jackson Heights, he did not expect to be tackled by a firefighter and two Southern Baptist missionaries from North Carolina.
abstract: Thief who snatched a purse from a young woman in Jackson Heights, Queens, is tackled by a firefighter and two Southern Baptists missionaries from North Carolina; suspect escaped after firing his gun into the crowd.
lead_paragraph: When a man snatched a purse from a young woman in Jackson Heights, he did not expect to be tackled by a firefighter and two Southern Baptist missionaries from North Carolina.

headline.seo: A Thief in Queens Is Thwarted by Missionaries
headline.main: Queens Thief Didn’t Count on Missionaries
headline.print_headline: Queens Thief Didn’t Count on Missionaries
